# f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit` data source retrieves information about an existing client connection limit.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit" "example" {
  name      = "my-connection-limit"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "enabled" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit.example.enabled
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the client connection limit to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the client connection limit is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the client connection limit.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the client connection limit is enabled.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the client connection limit.
